name: Planet Pulverizer
description:
Attention: There is currently a bug that glitches the skill tree when you get to the planet finder skill. This doesn't let you reach the last skill sadly ): 

BUT there's a way to try it out. Restart the game, and when you get to the tutorial, press "O" 10 times - this is the cheat for planet points. You can unlock everything and get to see the last skill, planet pulverizer (and the shield as well).

Another bug is the collision bug. When you collide with things, the physics go crazy. Press tab twice to fix it.

Pulverize every planet you find.

WASD Ctrl Space: Movement

QE Mouse: Rotation

Tab: Skill Tree

Gatling gun: Left Click

Missile: Right Click

Evasion: F

Planet Pulverizer: G
